rooms.description: Spacious living area with modern decor, large windows for ample natural light.
Connected to the kitchen via an open plan layout, wheelchair accessible entrance.
Modern, fully equipped kitchen with island counter and provisions for mobility accessibility including lower countertops.
Well-lit bedroom with en-suite bathroom and ample storage space, designed for wheelchair accessibility including wider doorways.
Additional bedroom with sufficient storage and natural light; design includes accessible features.
Cozy library area integrated into the living space, with low shelves accessible from a seated position.
Wider corridor throughout ground floor ensuring wheelchair maneuverability between rooms.

openings.features: Wheelchair accessible ramp provided at the entrance, automatic sliding doors.

openings.description: Outdoor balcony area connected to the living room for natural ventilation and aesthetic appeal.

rooms.description: Primary bedroom with en-suite bathroom, designed with accessible features including wider doorways and lowered fixtures.
Full bath attached to the primary bedroom, equipped with grab bars and non-slip surfaces for safety.
Private study area integrated into the floor plan for work or hobbies, with natural lighting from large windows.

openings.description: Sturdy and spacious staircase connecting ground to first floor, designed with a wheelchair-accessible lift option considered in planning.

rooms.description: Multi-purpose attic space that can be used as a recreation room or additional storage, ensuring open floor plan with ample natural light.

openings.description: Additional staircase connecting first to second floor, designed with accessibility in mind and potential for an elevator integration.

vastu_considerations.orientation: North-facing entrance to maximize positive energy flow
vastu_considerations.room_alignment: Main living area aligned along the east-west axis, library placed in the northwest corner for quiet and focus.

building_norms.triplex_design: Multi-level arrangement with ground floor dedicated to accessibility and communal spaces, upper floors optimized for private living and recreational use.
